name: Prototype (itch) (Mork Shmork)
description:
The year is 200X, and the world has been taken over by aliens...

All remaining humans were sent to be experimented on in a unknown galaxy.

It is up to you to find a way out of the experiments and escape the planet.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Notes: This game is in early access. More levels will be added depending on support.

This was also my first ever game made in unity.
